description: Griddled baby leeks make an elegant side dish or entree with hazelnuts and creamy goats cheese.
keywords: BBQ vegetables,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free
name: Griddled Leeks with Goats Cheese & Hazelnuts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to the boil and cook the leeks for 90 seconds, drain well and pat dry. Heat a griddle pan on high heat, drizzle a little oil and cook the leeks for 1 minute on each side until lightly charred.
Whisk the rest of the oil, mustard and vinegar together in a large bowl. Add the leeks and toss well to coat.
Place the hazelnuts in a dry pan on medium high heat and cook for 3-4 minutes, tossing frequently, until lightly toasted. Chop into rough pieces.
Serve the leeks with extra dressing drizzled on top, crumbled goats cheese, toasted hazelnuts and fresh parsley.
